text:
[Verse]
Morning sky is gray
Stepping out today
Raindrops clap and play
Wash my blues away

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the street
Moving with my feet
Heartbeat's steady beat
Find my groove repeat

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the world sustain
Join the joyful train
Nothing feels the same

[Verse 3]
Splashes all around
Find a new playground
To the rhythm bound
In the world we’re found

[Verse 4]
Skies are overcast
Storm will never last
Moments moving fast
Hold on make them last

[Bridge]
Rain can never tire
Set our hearts on fire
Rise a little higher
Reach out for desire
title: Dancing in the Rain
